categories.name: Web Application Scanners
categories.description: Tools for scanning and testing web applications for vulnerabilities, SQL injection, XSS, and other web-based security issues.

categories.name: Password Crackers
categories.description: Tools for password recovery, hash cracking, and authentication testing including brute-force and dictionary attacks.

categories.name: Vulnerability Scanners
categories.description: Comprehensive vulnerability assessment and network scanning tools that identify security weaknesses across systems and networks.

categories.name: Cloud Security
categories.description: Tools for assessing and securing cloud infrastructure and services across AWS, Azure, GCP, and other cloud providers.

categories.name: Active Directory
categories.description: Tools for analyzing and testing Active Directory environments, identifying attack paths, and assessing security posture.

categories.name: Static Analysis
categories.description: Code analysis tools that examine application source code for security vulnerabilities and coding issues.

categories.name: Database Exploitation
categories.description: Tools for testing and exploiting database vulnerabilities, SQL injection, and database security assessment.

categories.name: Network Attack Tools
categories.description: Tools for network-based attacks, protocol testing, and network security assessment.

categories.name: Wordlist Generators
categories.description: Tools for generating custom wordlists for password cracking and security testing.

categories.name: Reconnaissance
categories.description: Tools for information gathering, enumeration, and reconnaissance activities in penetration testing.

categories.name: Cloud Enumeration
categories.description: Tools for discovering and enumerating cloud resources and configurations.

categories.name: Code Scanners
categories.description: Tools for scanning source code and identifying security vulnerabilities in applications.

categories.name: Network Scanners
categories.description: Tools for network discovery, port scanning, and network topology mapping.
